Name: Overseer shabti
Description: An overseer shabti made from a blue-green glazed faience, dressed in everyday clothing. The eyes are painted in black and in the right hand is held a black-painted whip. The left arm hangs straight down.The figure wears a short, duplex wig which is decorated with a seshed-headband with ties at the back that almost reach the feet. The kilt panel projects at the front and on it is a single line of text without a border.The back is flat.
